patthana23.30:4.1: Namahaggataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā mahaggato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.30:5.1: Namahaggataṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.30:6.1: Naparittaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.30:6.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
